nodes.documentation:
Abstract base contract for token sales with the default buy entry points.
 * Handle
- start and end dates
- accepting investments
- minimum funding goal and refund
- various statistics during the crowdfund
- different pricing strategies
- different investment policies (require server side customer id, allow only whitelisted addresses)
 * Does not Handle
 * - Token allocation (minting vs. transfer)
- Cap rules
nodes.name: Crowdsale

nodes.documentation:
Preallocate tokens for the early investors.
   * Preallocated tokens have been sold before the actual crowdsale opens.
This function mints the tokens and moves the crowdsale needle.
   * Investor count is not handled; it is assumed this goes for multiple investors
and the token distribution happens outside the smart contract flow.
   * No money is exchanged, as the crowdsale team already have received the payment.
   * @param fullTokens tokens as full tokens - decimal places added internally
@param weiPrice Price of a single full token in wei
nodes.name: preallocate

nodes.documentation: Allow anonymous contributions to this crowdsale.
nodes.name: investWithSignedAddress

nodes.documentation: Track who is the customer making the payment so we can send thank you email.
nodes.name: investWithCustomerId

nodes.documentation: Allow anonymous contributions to this crowdsale.
nodes.name: invest

nodes.documentation: Invest to tokens, recognize the payer and clear his address.
nodes.name: buyWithSignedAddress

nodes.documentation: Invest to tokens, recognize the payer.
nodes.name: buyWithCustomerIdWithChecksum

nodes.documentation: Legacy API signature.
nodes.name: buyWithCustomerId

nodes.documentation:
The basic entry point to participate the crowdsale process.
   * Pay for funding, get invested tokens back in the sender address.
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation: Set policy do we need to have server-side customer ids for the investments.
nodes.name: setRequireCustomerId

nodes.documentation:
Set policy if all investors must be cleared on the server side first.
   * This is e.g. for the accredited investor clearing.
nodes.name: setRequireSignedAddress
